posts.post_content:
FS Ramly T204 Anderson SGC 20, Square Frame.

UPDATE 1/26...SOLD

SOLD

The last recorded sale I can find for this card at this grade is REA 2011 for $3800 and change. Not sure if this includes BP or not.

If you're wondering, the smudge near Anderson's ear is some kind of surface debris. It might or might not be removable, though I'm not sure I'd mess with it. 

Paypal OK. Sale price will include shipping with insurance in the U.S.

Thanks, Ray

Email: semloh00 (at) yahoo.com

Great looking 1.5 Ray, best of luck
Thanks, Pete. I've had this card for a couple of years...a long time for me for any single card. Been waffling on letting it go for a while!
